description: A playful pun on stairs and their deceptive nature.
title: Stair Suspicion
n_1: Max eyes a staircase warily as he approaches.
n_2: Ruby begins climbing, but Max hesitates at the bottom.
n_3: Max points accusingly as Ruby reaches the halfway point.
n_4: They both laugh as Ruby reaches the top, Max following.
c1_4: Guess I’m up to something now too!
